scripts.dev: uv run --group dev python -m watchdog.watchmedo auto-restart --pattern '*.py' --recursive --signal SIGTERM -- uv run python -m pkg
scripts.dev:crdt: uv run --group dev python -m watchdog.watchmedo auto-restart --pattern '*.py' --recursive --signal SIGTERM -- uv run python -m pkg.__main__ --db-path ./main.db --crdt-db ./crdt.db
scripts.prerelease: uv run pytest && uv run ruff check && uv run ruff format --check
